meanings.definition: A person who removes someone from a position of power or authority.
meanings.sent1: The deposers in the story bravely stood up to the unjust ruler.
meanings.sent2: The board of directors voted to appoint a new deposer for the company.
meanings.sent3: The deposers decided to play a game of chess to determine the new leader.
meanings.sent4: The deposers were like knights in shining armor, fighting for justice.
meanings.sent5: The image of the deposers marching into the palace will forever be etched in history.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism used to place something in a specific location.
meanings.sent1: The factory workers used the deposers to carefully position the fragile components.
meanings.sent2: The deposers in the assembly line ensured precise placement of each part.
meanings.sent3: The robotic deposers danced gracefully as they arranged the colorful blocks.
meanings.sent4: The deposers hummed softly as they delicately set the jewels in the crown.
meanings.sent5: The futuristic deposers moved with precision, like skilled artists creating a masterpiece.
